Game: Shamu's Deep Sea Adventures 2005-11-01T00:00:00-07:00 Shamu's Deep Sea Adventures is a video game linked to SeaWorld's popular Shamu orca shows. The game was released in November 2005 and is available for GameCube, Game Boy Advance, Nintendo DS, PlayStation 2, and Xbox. <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/12834b54-6e72-496c-953a-eba7da1339a9.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/dcad18ba-703d-4c88-8676-b473cc697b0a.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/8cc83077-f169-4cc8-baac-bb7aa5527588.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/ba9bbeb2-0dd2-48e0-b17d-97866ff66713.png https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shamu%27s_Deep_Sea_Adventures Action Fun Labs Activision
